results.name: Exponential transform of Stirling2 triangle A008277.
mathematica: nn=8; a=Exp[x]-1; Drop[Map[Select[#, #>0&]&, Range[0,nn]! CoefficientList[Series[Exp[Exp[y a]-1], {x,0,nn}], {x,y}]], 1]//Grid (* _Geoffrey Critzer_, Sep 22 2013 *)
